titleStmt.title: A dialogue between a blind-man and death
titleStmt.author: Standfast, Richard, 1608?-1684.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Standfast by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Item at 1685:16 identified as D1291; entry cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.)
